definition: to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil

sentences.english: We usually have the celebration with feasts and firecrackers.
sentences.chinese: 我們通常以豐盛的閤家宴和鞭炮來慶祝新年。

sentences.english: He is lunching me well at the Friday Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 他在星期五飯店招待我喫豐盛的午餐。

sentences.english: As a pastor, I want you to succeed in life.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個牧師，我盼望你有一個豐盛的生命。

sentences.english: and just celebrate the day indoors with presents and with a large dinner.
sentences.chinese: 就只是在家慶祝這一天，互贈禮物，享受豐盛的晚餐。

sentences.english: But the meek will inherit the land and enjoy great peace.
sentences.chinese: 但謙卑人必承受地土，以豐盛的平安爲樂。

sentences.english: Lai i Junchen had a sumptuous 10 feast prepared, and invited Zhou Xing to his home.
sentences.chinese: 他準備了一桌豐盛的酒席，把周興請到自己家裏。

sentences.english: November is for thanksgiving, count God's bounteous graces.
sentences.chinese: 十一月是感恩的季節，細數神所賜的豐盛恩典。

sentences.english: Chastity is a wealth that comes from abundance of love.
sentences.chinese: 貞操是從豐盛奧比島范冰冰情中生出來海賊王財產。

sentences.english: We cooked a five-course meal on that little stove.
sentences.chinese: 我們在小爐子煮了一桌有五個主菜的豐盛大餐。

sentences.english: That evening we prepared a rather outstanding meal that we cooked over the campfire.
sentences.chinese: 那晚我們拜營火之賜，準備了一頓相當豐盛的晚餐。

sentences.english: A wealth of grasses covered the rich earth, like a green carpet.
sentences.chinese: 豐盛的草蓋滿了肥沃的土地，像一層綠色的地毯。

sentences.english: On the last day of the lunar year, there is a big familydinner。
sentences.chinese: 陰曆年的最後一天，通常要喫一頓豐盛的團圓飯。

sentences.english: The cosy restaurant, Curnonsky, serves gastronomic and modern menus.
sentences.chinese: 酒店每天早晨提供豐盛的早餐。

sentences.english: I knew that Dad had slaughtered onetoday and now we were going to eat it.
sentences.chinese: 我知道這是爸爸今天殺牛宰羊爲我們準備的豐盛晚餐。

sentences.english: We had a sumptuous feast of reunion.
sentences.chinese: 我們吃了一頓豐盛的團圓飯。

definition: not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
valuable/precious/to value/to treasure/to set store by
